name: websocket-mock-server
description: WebSocket 模拟服务器，用于 demo-free-layout 项目的开发和测试

scripts.dev: ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only --ignore-watch node_modules --ignore-watch dist --watch src --watch public src/server.ts
scripts.dev:nodemon: nodemon --exec ts-node src/server.ts --watch src --watch public --ext ts,js,html,css
scripts.start:all: npm run build && npm run start

author: Demo Free Layout Team
